items.title: The Journey Home
items.description: A prodigal son returns to his roots and rediscovers his faith through family reconciliation.

items.title: Miracle Workers
items.description: A community comes together to rebuild their historic church after a natural disaster.

items.title: Light in Darkness
items.description: A missionary's journey of hope in challenging circumstances overseas.

items.title: The Pastor's Heart
items.description: A new pastor faces challenges while trying to unite a divided congregation.

items.title: Amazing Grace
items.description: The true story of a church choir overcoming adversity to compete nationally.

items.title: Faith's Trial
items.description: A lawyer defends religious freedom in a landmark court case.

items.title: The Healing Garden
items.description: A woman's faith helps her transform a community through urban gardening.

items.title: Prayer Warriors
items.description: A group of friends discover the power of prayer in their daily lives.

items.title: The Youth Pastor
items.description: An unconventional youth pastor connects with troubled teens through music.

items.title: Sacred Hearts
items.description: Hospital chaplains bring hope to patients and staff during challenging times.

items.title: The Believer
items.description: An atheist journalist's investigation leads to unexpected spiritual discoveries.

items.title: Second Chances
items.description: A former inmate finds redemption through faith and community service.

items.title: The Mission House
items.description: Volunteers at a homeless shelter witness daily miracles of transformation.

items.title: Faith of Our Fathers
items.description: Three generations of a family navigate their spiritual heritage.

items.title: The Christmas Miracle
items.description: A small town experiences unexpected blessings during the holiday season.

items.title: Faithful Steps
items.description: A dance teacher uses her talents to help troubled youth find purpose.

items.title: The Prayer Circle
items.description: Women from different backgrounds form a powerful prayer group.

items.title: Faith Under Fire
items.description: First responders rely on their faith during a catastrophic event.

items.title: The Gospel Truth
items.description: A struggling musician rediscovers his roots in gospel music.

items.title: Faithful Hearts
items.description: A faith-based marriage counselor faces challenges in her own relationship.
